attributes.action: Change the Union Flag to represent the make up of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current Union Flag is made up of the flags of England, Scotland and the Kingdom of Ireland.
The Kingdom of Ireland no longer exists since the republic was given independence and the Welsh Nation is not reflected at all.
It is time to remove the Irish Reference and include either the Welsh Dragon or the St Davids Cross on the Flag, along with any representation of Northern Ireland
